title: "OMG I FINALLY GOT THE CHAMP I WANT IN ARURF"

replies.body: Or once you get them, someone dodges.

NICE I GOT ZED!

oh nvm im versus Lissandra,Kayle,Tahm Kench,Ahri and Vladimir.

Cool.
I have 0 sympathy. Zed is cancerous.

{{champion:92}} "nice! now i can finally stomp a game! i can't wait to-" *dodge* "oh"

{{champion:202}}/{{champion:133}}/{{champion:120}}  "oh wow! nobody dodged this time! i can't wait to go real fast!"

enemy team: {{champion:127}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:105}} 

"i only want to die a _little_ bit"

Heca still smashes them all. He just needs some few early kills, maybe somewhat safe laning phase and then roaming starts, then his kill count going through the roof, then enemy players just give up and go afk, as Hecarims charge deals damage in thousands with close to game-breaking speed.

Once I got hec, tried to lane, failed, realized i was lvl 3, roamed all over the map and snowballed all the lanes. 

Didnt even have right runes, arcane comet omegalol
I GOT TAHM KENCH, literally everyone on the enemy team has a spammable dash. lol

gets nami finally
team dodges
gets nami again
enemy team has a sona and soraka
https://i.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/026/638/cat.jpg
your name does not match the champion you want.
Nami is the best in URF!
Or... it's "OMG YES I'VE BEEN WAITING FOR THIS CHAMPION" then someone dodges then you get a generic champion you played 100+ times. Happened to me several times.
I love getting Taliyah against a dash heavy comp. Just lay down my minefield and watch the magic happen.
or every pick you finally get since ever gets hard countered?
More like enemy team rolled fizz, heimer, eko, garen, yi

Oh I'm a full defense stacked 5k hp Sion.

No problem, Mordekaiser shreds me even through a Visage and Adaptive Helm.
hehe ur welcome from the 4 people who play him.
Dude shoulda been playing inting Sion

I main Ezreal and got him but gave it to my friend as long as he rerolled for me, and got Thresh. Against Malz, Zyra, Heimer, Shaco and Annie. Needless to say, I didn't land very many hooks on champions that game.
\> allied team has a jungler and an inting botlane

Oh I got {{champion:134}} 

Now I'm getting 1 shot by a {{champion:120}} without any way to counterplay it.
Alternatively: You get Nami for the 4th time!
Nami is OP in URF...
It's a comment on the "random" nature and wanting to play something you like even if it isn't great.
Who've thought, that URF is actually not a fun game mode (well, maybe for like 2 matches), ARURF or normal URF.
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kvS6zMThiZU/hqdefault.jpg
https://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/235605870/200123317?tab=overview
> Somebody dodges.

1. get the champion you enjoy playing (but isn't ultra-OP even in URF)
2. enemy team consists of greatest URF cancers that ruin the mode
Whenever I get a champ I want in ARAM somebody dodges.  I've been thinking I should make an ARAM only account.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QVaeX74b,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-03-18T04:21:44.118+0000)
>
> Whenever I get a champ I want in ARAM somebody dodges.  I've been thinking I should make an ARAM only account.

Wont work, ARAM includes the 3 previous rotations

That's why anurf sucks.
if you can't play what you enjoy it sucks.

And while I play a lot of aram, that's mostly for team fight experience. And I still liked the pork King game mode (even tho I hated the actually poro King thing).

Since I could actually pick the character I want to play.

I feel ya... I get very often my favorite champions to go fast and I never manage to complete my build. It's either someone on the enemy or on the my team that becomes unstoppable and by that the game is over or at least decided.

I was told something along the lines of I suck cuz I didn't carry as Zed in URF

I was against Jayce and  {{item:3800}} Leona -_-

I GOT EVE!

Enemy got Akali Fiora Ezreal Malphite and Hecarim.

Oh...

Side note, Crit Hit Zoe with Deaths Dance can tank a predator Hecarim and it's hilarious.
